Posts.Content: Caylee wrote: Im starting Chemotherapy on October 12, 2012 and Im really scared. I dont know what I am suppose to be doing before and during chemo, does anyone have any advise for me? Dx 8/2/2012, IDC, 3cm, Stage II, Grade 3, 0/2 nodes, ER+/PR+, HER2+ Surgery 8/22/2012 Lumpectomy: Right; Lymph node removal: Right, Sentinel Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Scared about Chemo!! Caylee SelenaWolf

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2012 10:23AM Caylee wrote: Hello: I am having TCH, Im not having a port put in, the onc just phoned me and he is mailing me my steriod pills that I am to take 24 hrs prior to my first injection. He didnt mention anything about any other meds, so when I got off the phone - I took one of my anxiety pills. When I had my surgery I didnt have a pump put in either. So what are you telling me the more treatments that are available for my triple positive, the better chance I have from it ever coming back?? I am Stage IIA - T2 NO MO - ER+  PR+  Her2+
Posts.Title: Scared about Chemo!! Caylee SelenaWolf

Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2012 10:09AM Caylee wrote: Thank you to everyone who posted a reply. You all make it sound so positive. I was feeling so alone and scared. October 10, I will begin with 8 glasses of cold water a day and everyday until I am done. I dont want to die of cancer, so I have to wrap my head around the journey I am about to take.  Hugs to all of you, Caylee
Posts.Title: Scared about Chemo!! Caylee SelenaWolf

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2012 07:03AM Caylee wrote: Hello, its Caylee again: I have done to much reading on the internet about my diagnosis and my doctor told me not too. Can someone tell me if I am right or wrong - I am in the tripple positive group, I have been told and I have read that being tripple positive is a good thing because it responds to the medicine better, IS that true????
Posts.Title: Scared about Chemo!! Caylee SelenaWolf

Posts.Content: Oct 15, 2012 01:51PM Caylee wrote: Hello, it's me Caylee! Anyone there? I had my first infusion on Friday and I feel like crap!! It took them 5 times to get the iv in, now I have to get a port in, I was wired and couldn't sleep from the decahedron for 3 days, got constipated and I am just soooo exhausted. I drank 50 million cups of water prior to chemo, didn't get nausea or vomit. Muscles are so soar now, can't even walk, no fever though, chemo is NOT for sissys!!!
Posts.Title: Scared about Chemo!! Caylee SelenaWolf

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2012 06:58AM Caylee wrote: Hello everybody: Im wondering, I have an appointment (Oct 11) the day before my first infusion (Oct 12), is that when the doctor gives me all the medicine I need to have on hand before my first infusion?? Or do I go to the pharmacy and get what I think I may need?? I dont even know what I would need?
